statements: SELECT * FROM air_pollution_data
SELECT location_name, pollution_level FROM air_pollution_data
SELECT latitude, longitude FROM air_pollution_data WHERE pollution_level > 50
SELECT id, location_name, pollution_level FROM air_pollution_data ORDER BY pollution_level DESC
SELECT * FROM air_pollution_data WHERE location_name = 'City A'
SELECT * FROM air_pollution_data WHERE pollution_level > 50 ORDER BY location_name ASC, pollution_level DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT location_name, AVG(pollution_level) AS average_pollution FROM air_pollution_data GROUP BY location_name ORDER BY average_pollution DESC
SELECT location_name, longitude, latitude, pollution_level FROM air_pollution_data WHERE latitude < 40 AND longitude > -100 ORDER BY pollution_level ASC
SELECT MAX(pollution_level) AS highest_pollution_level, MIN(pollution_level) AS lowest_pollution_level FROM air_pollution_data
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM air_pollution_data WHERE pollution_level < 30 ORDER BY location_name DESC
SELECT * FROM air_pollution_data
SELECT location, pollution_level FROM air_pollution_data WHERE pollution_level > 50
SELECT * FROM monitoring_stations ORDER BY station_name DESC
SELECT station_name, latitude, longitude FROM monitoring_stations WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < -100
SELECT AVG(pollution_level) AS average_pollution FROM air_pollution_data
SELECT location, pollution_level FROM air_pollution_data WHERE pollution_level > 50 ORDER BY location ASC
SELECT * FROM monitoring_stations WHERE latitude < 40 AND longitude > -100 ORDER BY station_name DESC
SELECT MAX(pollution_level) AS highest_pollution FROM air_pollution_data
SELECT station_name, latitude, longitude FROM monitoring_stations WHERE station_name LIKE '%City%'
SELECT AVG(pollution_level) AS avg_pollution_level FROM air_pollution_data
SELECT * FROM AirPollutionMonitorings;
SELECT monitor_id, pollution_level, latitude, longitude FROM AirPollutionMonitorings ORDER BY pollution_level DESC;
SELECT area_name, high_concentration FROM AreaDetails WHERE high_concentration = TRUE;
SELECT monitor_id, date FROM HeatmapData ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT map_id, monitor_id, date FROM HeatmapData WHERE monitor_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM AirPollutionMonitorings WHERE pollution_level > 50 ORDER BY monitor_id DESC;
SELECT area_name, description FROM AreaDetails WHERE high_concentration = TRUE;
SELECT monitor_id, latitude, longitude, pollution_level FROM AirPollutionMonitorings WHERE pollution_level BETWEEN 20 AND 50;
SELECT AVG(pollution_level) AS average_pollution FROM AirPollutionMonitorings;
SELECT map_id, monitor_id, date FROM HeatmapData ORDER BY date DESC, map_id;
SELECT * FROM AirQualityMonitors;
SELECT monitor_id, location_name, air_quality_index FROM AirQualityMonitors WHERE air_quality_index > 50;
SELECT monitor_id, location_name, latitude, longitude FROM AirQualityMonitors ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM PollutionData WHERE pollutant_type = 'PM2.5' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT heatmap_id, coordinates->>'latitude' AS latitude, coordinates->>'longitude' AS longitude, pollution_level FROM HeatmapData WHERE pollution_level > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM AirQualityMonitors ORDER BY monitor_id DESC;
SELECT location_name, air_quality_index FROM AirQualityMonitors WHERE air_quality_index > 50;
SELECT * FROM PollutionData WHERE pollutant_level > 0.5 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT monitor_id, MAX(pollutant_level) AS max_pollutant_level FROM PollutionData GROUP BY monitor_id;
SELECT coordinates, pollution_level FROM HeatmapData WHERE pollution_level > 1.0 ORDER BY pollution_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM Pollution_Criteria;
SELECT station_id, station_name FROM Monitoring_Stations ORDER BY station_name DESC;
SELECT MAX(pollution_level) AS max_pollution FROM Air_Pollution_Data;
SELECT station_name, location_lat, location_long FROM Monitoring_Stations WHERE location_lat > 40;
SELECT image_url FROM Heatmap_Images WHERE area_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM Monitoring_Stations;
SELECT station_name, location_lat, location_long FROM Monitoring_Stations;
SELECT station_name, AVG(location_lat), AVG(location_long) FROM Monitoring_Stations GROUP BY station_name;
SELECT station_name, pollution_level, measurement_date FROM Monitoring_Stations INNER JOIN Air_Pollution_Data ON Monitoring_Stations.station_id = Air_Pollution_Data.station_id;
SELECT area_name, image_url FROM Heatmap_Areas INNER JOIN Heatmap_Images ON Heatmap_Areas.area_id = Heatmap_Images.area_id;
